title: Let's Clear Up This Rocky Situation, A$AP!
itunes:title: Let's Clear Up This Rocky Situation, A$AP!
description:
WED 7/20 - A$AP Rocky makes an impromptu trip to The Breakfast Club to clear up some comments a journalist released regarding his views on the BLM movement and incidents that plague the urban community. He had a lot on his mind so hear the leader of the MOB movement's mix of emotion & frustration.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
